title: Sconce, ca. 1720
medium: Quill-work, silver, glass, and black-painted pine
markings: Exhibition and owner labels on back.
description: Within the glazed wooded frame which is crested with pierced scrollings and foliations is enclosed a quill-work composition of scrolls and flowers, roses, tulips, carnations, etc. in a vase. A siler bracket at the base receives the S-curved arm which terminates in candle-holder and drip pan.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sconce, ca. 1720.
ca. 1720. Quill-work, silver, glass, and black-painted pine. Bequest of Natalie K. Blair. 1952-14-4-a.
